page.title: 04BUILTH(W):RECREATION,FISHING
page.content: Fishing is quite a popular sport locally.A good rod costs at least Â£20.Hooks,weights and line range from 12p to about Â£5.A junior licence costs about Â£4.60;there is also a day licence which costs 95p. Salmon fishing occurs from around February or March and trout fishing from March the 20.There are quite a few species of fish including the small dace, the most popular fish, trout,greyling,chub & also pike are common.To fish for trout the most popular bait is worms. Greyling,which is a coarse fish,can be caught with worms but mostly with bread or cheese;the chub can also be caught with these.
